articles.description: While TCS is seen reporting a moderate growth in revenue in constant currency terms sequentially, Infosys will see the topline declining by more than 1 per cent, according to estimates given by brokerage firms.
articles.content: The first half of the current financial year was tough for information technology companies, and is likely to have been so even in the December quarter, which typically is a seasonally weak period fo… [+2280 chars]

articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Sensex drops 400 points as global markets tumble; Nifty below 21,550 - The Economic Times
articles.description: From the Sensex stocks, Tata Steel, Wipro, Infosys, JSW Steel, HCL Tech and Tech Mahindra were the top laggards, falling 1-2%. On the flip side, Reliance, Sun Pharma, Bajaj Finance, Nestle, and M&M opened with gains.
articles.content: Indian benchmark equity indices extended their decline after opening in the red on Wednesday, trackinga decline in global markets. Index heavyweights banking and IT stocks were the top drags.The BSE … [+2501 chars]

articles.author: Bhaskar Dutta
articles.title: SBI raises $1 billion in offshore syndicated loan - The Economic Times
articles.description: The success of this transaction reflects the improvement in the bank's credit and business profile, which is the result of tremendous work put in by SBI as a team over the years,  SBI Chairman Dinesh Khara said exclusively to ET.
articles.content: Mumbai: State Bank of India (SBI) has raised $1 billion, or double the amount originally envisaged, in an offshore syndicated loan arranged by HSBC and subscribed by lenders across continents, demons… [+2208 chars]
